content: Backup is stored in the 'Backup' section, you will be able to download it within 24 hours after creating.

comment.text: The TemporaryStorageDescription translation key is used to display a message explaining the backup storage location and download process. It appears as an unavailable text when a manual backup option is checked in the PortalSettings category. Translators should provide a clear explanation of this concept for users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation includes quotation marks around 'النسخ الاحتياطي' which should match the English 'Backup' section.  The English uses single quotes, and the Arabic should ideally mirror this for consistency, especially in UI contexts. Consider using single quotes or removing the quotes entirely.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using single quotes ( ' ) around 'النسخ الاحتياطي' to match the English format or remove the quotes completely.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Backup' is translated as 'Архивиране'. While technically correct, 'Архивиране' implies a more complex archiving process. 'Архивно копие' (Archive copy) would be a more accurate translation of 'Backup' in this context, referring specifically to the temporary storage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Архивиране' with 'Архивно копие'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content includes single quotes around 'Backup'. The Bulgarian translation should consistently follow the same formatting by using single quotes around 'Архивиране'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add single quotes around 'Архивиране' -  'Архивното копие се съхранява в секцията 'Архивно копие', ще можете да го изтеглите в рамките на 24 часа след създаването.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Backup' is translated as 'Αντίγραφα ασφαλείας'. While technically correct, 'Αντίγραφο ασφαλείας' (singular) would be more natural and consistent with the English 'Backup'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Backup' as 'Αντίγραφο ασφαλείας' throughout the text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'TemporaryStorageDescription' implies a description of where the backup is stored temporarily. The Finnish translation focuses on the backup process itself ('Varmuuskopiointi'). While not entirely wrong, it's not the most accurate translation given the key name. A more suitable translation might emphasize the temporary nature of the storage location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Varmuuskopio tallennetaan väliaikaisesti 'Varmuuskopiointi' -osioon, voit ladata sen 24 tunnin kuluessa luomisesta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'Varmuuskopiointi' in the Finnish translation is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it might be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Varmuuskopiointi tallennetaan 'Varmuuskopiointi' -osioon, voit ladata sen 24 tunnin kuluessa luomisesta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'you will be able to download it' is somewhat stiff in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Կարողանաք ներբեռնել այն ստեղծելուց հետո 24 ժամվա ընթացքում։ (Could also be: Ձեզ հասանելի կլինի ներբեռնել այն ստեղծելուց հետո 24 ժամվա ընթացքում.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after '24 hours' feels slightly unnatural in Armenian. A period is more common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պահուստավորումը պահվում է 'Պահուստ' բաժնում, դուք կկարողանաք ներբեռնել այն ստեղծելուց հետո 24 ժամվա ընթացքում։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses katakana for 'Backup' (バックアップ) while the English uses a standard English term. This might be jarring to users accustomed to seeing 'Backup' rendered in a consistent manner. While not strictly incorrect, maintaining consistency is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Backup' to 「バックアップデータ」 or a similar phrase for consistency with other parts of the interface. Alternatively, ensure that 'Backup' is consistently displayed in English throughout the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word '백업' (backup) is repeated unnecessarily. It appears in both the section name and the description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 백업은 '백업' 섹션에 저장되며 생성 후 24시간 이내에 다운로드할 수 있습니다. -> 백업은 '백업' 섹션에 저장되며 생성 후 24시간 이내에 다운로드할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ການ​ສໍາ​ຮອງ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ແມ່ນ​ເກັບ​ໄວ້​ໃນ​ພາກ​ສ່ວນ 'ສໍາ​ຮອງ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​' is slightly redundant. 'ການ​ສໍາ​ຮອງ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​' is repeated. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການ​ສໍາ​ຮອງ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ແມ່ນ​ເກັບ​ໄວ້​ໃນ​ພາກ​ສ່ວນ 'Backup' ທ່ານ​ຈະ​ສາ​ມາດ​ດາວ​ໂຫລດ​ໄດ້​ພາຍ​ໃນ 24 ຊົ່ວ​ໂມງ​ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ສ້າງ​.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Backup' is used in English, it's best to maintain consistency. Either use Lao throughout or explain that 'Backup' is the English term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain consistency - either translate 'Backup' or explain its use. For example: 'ການ​ສໍາ​ຮອງ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ແມ່ນ​ເກັບ​ໄວ້​ໃນ​ພາກ​ສ່ວນ 'Backup' (ພາກສ່ວນນີ້ແມ່ນຊື່ພາສາອັງກິດ).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Back-up' is inconsistent in capitalization. The English uses 'Backup' while the Dutch uses 'Back-up'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain consistency. Either use 'Back-up' throughout or adapt to 'Backup'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses 'Kopia zapasowa' for both 'Backup' (the section name) and 'Backup' (the data being backed up). This is repetitive and could be confusing. It should ideally use a different term for the section name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a term like 'Archiwum' or 'Zapisy' for the section name to differentiate it from the backup data itself. For example: 'Kopia zapasowa jest przechowywana w sekcji 'Archiwum' i będzie gotowa do pobrania w ciągu 24 godzin od jej utworzenia.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase 'od jej utworzenia' sounds slightly awkward in Polish. It's more natural to avoid the reflexive pronoun.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'od jej utworzenia' with 'po jej utworzeniu' or simply 'po utworzeniu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Backup' is translated as 'Cópias de Segurança', which is correct, but the original English uses single quotes around 'Backup'. The translation should mirror this formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A cópia de segurança é armazenada na secção de 'Cópias de Segurança', poderá fazer o download da cópia dentro de 24 horas após a criação.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'pe care o puteți descărca' is somewhat awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'pe care o puteți încărca' or 'o puteți descărca'. The English uses 'download', and while 'descărca' is the direct translation, the flow feels less natural in Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Copia de rezervă este stocată în secția 'Copiere de rezervă' și o puteți descărca în termen de 24 ore de la crearea.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'Copiere de rezervă' (Backup) in both English and Romanian is slightly jarring.  Consider if the Romanian can be shorter on the first instance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Copia de rezervă este stocată în secțiunea 'Backup' pe care o puteți descărca în termen de 24 ore de la crearea.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses single quotes for 'Резервное копирование' when double quotes would be more consistent with the English 'Backup'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change single quotes to double quotes: "Резервное копирование"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala text includes a Sinhala number (𑇫𑇤) representing '24' instead of a standard Arabic numeral. This can cause display issues and reduce clarity for users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 𑇫𑇤 with '24'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'උපස්ථය' is repeated. 'උපස්ථය' translates to 'Backup'. While technically correct, repetition is awkward in Sinhala. The phrase 'Backup is stored in the 'Backup' section' reads strangely.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase to avoid repetition. For example: 'ආවරණය 'ආවරණය' කොටසෙහි ගබඩා කර ඇත.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. The phrase 'සෑදීමෙන් පැය 𑇫𑇤 ක් ඇතුළත ඔබට එය බාගැනීමට හැකිය' is grammatically correct, but might sound unnatural. A more natural flow could be achieved by reordering the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the second part of the sentence to improve the flow. For example: 'එය ඔබට පැය 𑇫𑇤 ක් ඇතුළත බාගැනීමට හැකිය.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The single quotes around 'Резервне копије' feel inconsistent with how 'Backup' is presented in the English source. It’s unclear why Cyrillic is used within the English word in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider whether to apply single quotes to 'Резервне копије' or match the English original and use the English term 'Backup' within the Serbian translation. If maintaining the Serbian term, ensure consistent formatting - either all single quotes or none.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a comma (,) where a period (.) might be more appropriate after 'kreiranja' to match standard Serbian sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rezervna kopija je smeštena u odeljku 'Rezervne kopije', moći ćete je preuzeti u roku od 24 sata nakon kreiranja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The single quotes around 'Backup' in the English content are not consistently represented in the Chinese translation. While the Chinese uses Chinese characters ('备份') instead of English, the original uses single quotes. This could create an inconsistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding punctuation or styling to match the original's emphasis, e.g., 备份板块
